name: Survive the Zombies (theSibii)
description:
This project was mainly created for learning purposes.
For any bugs, errors or even ideas on how to improve the game feel free to write me in the comments

[About]

Survive for as long as possible on a highway in the middle of a remote forest while facing hordes and hordes of zombies ready to take you out.

Collect what the zombies leave on the ground, those supplies will be useful for you to continue playing, good luck. Oh I almost forgot, watch out for the road.

[Credits] Expand to see the game credits Highway Background by alucard
Images provided by icons8.com
